ingredient-information.sestavine: Water (Aqua), Alcohol*, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Coco-Glucoside,Glycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Glyceryl Oleate, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral.

product-info.opis: WELEDA aroma gel za prhanje energy - poživitev za telo in čute ingver + citronela + cedrovina. S 100 % naravnimi eteričnimi olji. Z organskimi sestavinami (glej INCI). Biorazgradljiva formulacija.* Certificirana naravna nega telesa.
